ok, so i been studying this for a long time, i think i have the correct stuff to make grand exchange…

things i have~

interfaces used
object id’s and action buttons used
search’s items on a new database file i made

what i think i gotta do…

i think i gotta do something like…

public void grandExchange(p.player, int interface, int object, int price){
if(p.player.actionButton(){
p.playerShowInterface(){
p.playerShowInterface(){
}
public void itemDatabase(p.player, int itemID, int itemName){
if(p.playerInterface() && playeSearch{
p.playerShowResults{
p.playerShowInterface(){
p.playerShowResults(){
}
public boolean showResults(p.player, int lowest, int average, int highest){
p.playerInterface(){
p.playerSearch = true;
p.playerGetItemID = true;
p.playerGetItemName = true;
p.playerGetLowest = true;
p.playerGetAverage = true;
p.playerGetHighest = treu;
}
public void sell(p.player, int itemId, int itemName, intPrice){
p.playerShowInterface(){
p.playerShowProgress = true;
}
public void buy(p.player, int itemId, int ItemName, intPrice){
p.playerShowInterface(*****){
p.playerShowProgress = true;
p.playerDeleteItem(995, amt);
}
public void done(p.player, int progress, int item){
p.playerShowProgress && progress >= 100;
p.playerSM(“Your grand exchange offers are updated.”);
}

im not sure, but i tested it, and it worked…but will it work for everyone?

NOTE: ***** = i didn’t want to give everything away…
NOTE: this is not a tut, it’s just a thing i figured i see if it works for all people
NOTE: i made this myself with help from cocoa from his shops.
